channel.title: Objects move on tele
channel.description:
I created a teleport portal (object) that teleports me to a specific location which in this case the HEIGHT is 1. (being 1 floor up)
When i use the portal and then teleport back to my home town (edgeville)
my character is floating above edgeville and the objects i added to the town are there to.
so when i teleport again i am on the regular floor of edge and my objects are still above me and i can not cut/mine/ect them.
then i teleport to pestcontrol, teleport back, and everything is back to normal..
how do i fix this?
make a new teleport portal in the training area (this is the place with height 1) that trigger tele's u back to edge? and disable regular teleport spells?
idk. any help ?

item.title: Objects move on tele
item.dc:creator: @andy111 andy111
item.description:
@andy111 wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:4, topic:341695”]put heightLevel = 0; in all your teleports to normal ground?
like in the ::home command

after the teleporting stuff, have it also set the height[/quote]

not EXACTLY sure how i would do that.

give me an example?

like after

toX
toY

?

example command please

EDIT:

NEVERMIND - I HAVE CHANGED THE LOCATION OF MY TRAINING ZONE TO AN AREA WITH 0 HEIGHT. THEREFOR IT WILL NOT MESS UP ANYTHING ELSE. PLEASE CLOSE THE THREAD

Read full topic

item.title: Objects move on tele
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

put heightLevel = 0; in all your teleports to normal ground?
like in the ::home command

after the teleporting stuff, have it also set the height

Read full topic

item.title: Objects move on tele
item.dc:creator: @andy111 andy111
item.description:
@andy111 wrote:

well i havent made a teleback portal yet… i was asking if that IS a good solution.

and if i make a teleback portal i need to DISABLE other teleports while there.

any help on how to make other tele’s disabled?

i may just end up moving my training area

Read full topic

item.title: Objects move on tele
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

on your teleporting back portal add this

height = 0;

Read full topic
